messages.subject: Fw: menuki offered...by who?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all - Who was it a few days back that offered some bat and moon motif menuki for sale? Contact me privately please,  swords@usroute66.net   A friend asked
messages.messageBody:
Hi all -

Who was it a few days back that offered some "bat and moon" motif menuki for sale? Contact me privately please, swords@... A friend asked me to find out about these. I'm not which group that mention came from, so I'll ask all of you. Thanks.

Ron
STL
